title: Roos Park Restaurant Website
description: Developed a full restaurant website using React & Node.js with AI-powered menu suggestions and smart ordering. Integrated online orders, table booking, WhatsApp chat, reviews, gallery, and admin panel.

title: Employee Management System
description: A web system with login, CRUD operations, Excel/CSV import-export, and analytics dashboard using Flask and MySQL.

title: Android Auth App
description: Created a clean Material 3 Android app with splash screen, email/password login, Google login, and secure Firebase backend.

title: Phone Inventory System
description: Built an inventory system with JWT authentication, product management, and real-time search.

title: AI Career Guidance App
description: An AI-based app that provides career advice in Gujarati and English using LLaMA integration.

title: Windows Forms CAD Automation
description: Automated CAD tasks with SolidWorks API, custom UserControls, and SQLite database handling.

title: Order Management System
description: Full-stack React + Node system for industrial workflow
